    • getAllPatients

    • getAvailableAppointmentsForDoctor

      @GetMapping("/receptionist/available_appointments") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAvailableAppointmentsForDoctor(@RequestParam String firstName, @RequestParam String lastName, @RequestParam String medicalService)
      GET "/receptionist/available_appointments?firstName=&lastName=?&medicalService="
      Parameters:
      firstName - the doctor's first name
      lastName - the doctor's last name
      medicalService - the name of the requested medical service
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the doctor can be found by the given name 404 NOT FOUND - if no doctor can be found by the given name

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      @PostMapping("/receptionist/appointment/update_state") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateAppointmentStatus(@RequestParam Integer appointmentId, @RequestParam String newState)
      POST "/receptionist/appointment/update_state?appointmentId=&newState="
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment
      newState - the new state
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the appointment's state could be successfully updated 405 METHOD NOT ALLOWED - if the user has no right to modifiy the state of the appointment (ex doctor) 400 BAD REQUEST - if the transition to the new state from the current state is not possible

    • scheduleAppointment

      @PostMapping("/receptionist/appointment/schedule") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity scheduleAppointment(@RequestParam Integer appointmentId, @RequestBody AppointmentDateRequest appointmentDate)
      POST "/receptionist/appointment/schedule?appointmentId=&appointmentDate=?"
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment
      appointmentDate - the date for the appointment
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the appointment's date has been successfully set 400 BAD REQUEST - if the date is invalid 404 NOT FOUND - if no appointment was found by the given id

    • changeSchedulingStrategy

      @PostMapping("/receptionist/change_strategy") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity changeSchedulingStrategy(@RequestParam String strategy)
      GET "/receptionist/change_strategy?strategy=?"
      Parameters:
      strategy - the new strategy
      Returns:
      200 OK - if the appointment's scheduling strategy has been successfully updated
